project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for the numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Add functionality to calculate the mean for specified numerical columns
Add functionality to calculate the median for specified numerical columns
Add functionality to calculate the mode for specified numerical columns
Implement user input handling to specify which numerical columns to analyze
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
